name: Christmas Stack!
description:
Christmas Stack! is a small indie Christmas match3 platform game.

You are a Santa's helper. You must match 3 gifts (or more) of the same type, or make a line of gifts, to send them to Santa.

There are 4 types of levels:

  • Score rush.
  • Delivery by type of gift.
  • Gift lines.
  • Destroy evil artifacts.

Version: The game is in alpha stage. You can download a demo of this alpha version with 7 levels to play.

Inspired by the game I developed at LudumDare 37.
